title: Who is Croatia’s Eurovision Song Contest 2017 entry? Jacques Houdek to perform My Friend – all you need to know
text:
JACQUES Houdek has been chosen to represent Croatia at this year’s Eurovision Song Contest. 
But what is his background, how was he chosen and what is Jacques singing? facebook Croatia’s Eurovision entry Jacques Houdek, who will sing the song ‘My Friend’ Who is Jacques Houdek? 
Jacques was born in the Croatian capital Zagreb and studied music in America as well as in France, Greece and Italy. 
The 35-year-old began singing professionally in 2002 and has tried to become Croatia’s Eurovision entry several times. 
He has released 13 albums in his home country and his biggest hit is ‘Stotinama Godina’. 
In 2011, he entered the British version of the X Factor and was put through to bootcamp by the then judges Gary Barlow, Louis Walsh, Kelly Rowland and Tulisa. 
But his work permit did not come in time to take part in bootcamp and he had to leave the contest. 
On his return to Croatia though, he landed a spot as a coach on the Croatian version of The Voice. 
And in his first series on the panel, he mentored his act Nina Kraljić, to victory. How was Jacques chosen to represent Croatia? Jacques is now a coach on the Croatia version of The Voice and also took part in British X Factor in 2011 
Unlike most countries, Croatia did not hold a public vote to chose their act for Eurovision. 
Instead, the decision fell to the country’s national broadcaster HRT, who plumped for Jacques, who is also known as ‘Mr Voice.’ 
Immediately after he was picked, Jacques expressed his joy at being chosen to sing for Croatia. 
He said: “I am extremely happy and thank Croatian Radio and Television for the trust they have shown. 
“Being a representative of Croatia at the Eurovision Song Contest is a big honour for me and I’m grateful for the opportunity”. What song is Jacques performing and who wrote it? 
During the main competition in May, Jacques will be performing the song My Friend. 
However, little else is known about the tune as it has yet to be released to the public. 
But given the song’s title, it is believed to be about togetherness and friendship. 
Already the Croatian national brodcaster has launched a social media campaign called #beMyfriend to promote the song. What are the odds on Jacques winning? 
Sunbets’ Eurovision odds currently list Croatia winning at 100/1. What are the lyrics to My Friend? Damian Fiket 3 Unlike most countries, Croatia didn’t hold a public vote, and Jacques was chosen to represent Croatia by national broadcaster HRT 
So far, all that has been revealed about the song is its title, theme and that it will be in English. 
It is yet to be played in public but watch this space… How many times has Croatia won the Eurovision Song Contest? 
Croatia first entered the Eurovision Song Contest in 1993 but has yet to win the singing spectacular. 
Their best place finishes were in 1996 and 1999 when they came fourth both times. 
Between 2010 and 2013 they failed to qualify for the grand final and did not even enter the competition in 2014 and 2015. 
They returned to Eurovision last year with their contestant Nina Kraljić coming 23rd with the song Lighthouse. X Factor contestant Jacques Houdek will represent Croatia at Eurovision When and where is the Eurovision Song Contest 2017 final? 
The final is due to take place on Saturday May 13, with semi-finals held on May 11 and 13. 
The event will be broadcast live from the International Exhibition Centre in the country’s capital Kiev. 
The reigning champion Jamala will be in attendance on the night to hand over the honour to this year’s winner performers.
